note: The word 'parecy' does not appear to be a standard English word. It may be a misspelling or a very obscure term. Please verify the intended word. Possible similar words include: 'parsec' (a unit of astronomical distance), 'parley' (a discussion or conference), or 'parity' (equality).

suggestions.definition: a unit of astronomical distance equal to about 3.26 light years
a conference between opposing sides in a dispute; to discuss terms with an opponent
the state or condition of being equal, especially regarding status or pay
